July 12, 1902 D Mumbles Contest (Section B)
Mumbles Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Mumbles Contest mumbles-contest-section-b
Don Pasquale
Mumbles Pier, Glamorgan Best soprano - Great Western. Best G trombone - Gwaun-cae-Gurwen. Best tenot trombone - Ystalyfera. 7 bands competed. 12th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest
July 5, 2018, 10:22 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:10 p.m.
1 Ystalyfera Public Charles Anthony Morgan
2 Dowlais Town William Smith
3 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen R. Castle
4 Great Western Colliery Silver J. H. Roberts
Unknown Result Tonyrefail Silver Prize Band Samuel Schofield
